name: Hex Gambit
detailed_description:
Features

  • Test your mettle in 1v1, or join a friend for 2v2 co-op
  • Six unlockable captains, each with a unique ultimate ability
  • Join a faction in our community-wide turf war: the Apex Cup
  • Transition seamlessly between real-time and asynchronous play online

Coming During Early Access

  • Two new minions: the Pacifist and Sniper
  • Choose your own squad of 5 minions; there are 21 different combinations!
  • Tackle our single player challenge mode: the Blitz Royale
  • Have a game night with couch multiplayer

Adapt and Conquer

In a world called Agon, the sharpest strategic minds command squads of expendable automatons in an explosive arena sport called Hex Gambit. Hex Gambit is a fresh take on turn-based strategy, designed to minimize complexity and maximize creativity. It’s easy to learn, there are tons of interesting ways to combine moves and characters, and battles only take around 15 minutes for experienced players.


Before each match, you’ll customize a squad of 5 minion classes and 1 captain. Each captain packs a unique Ultimate that can help you out of a tough situation, and each minion possesses 3 unique special moves. There will be 7 minions to choose from on launch day for 21 team combinations, times 6 captains.

A quick setup phase cuts right to the action: arrange some starter minions however you like on your side of the map. Victory Points are awarded for minion kills, and for each time you can “tap” a crystal pillar on the hostile side of the map. First to 10VP wins.

Keep It Moving

Our checkers-inspired movement mechanic, called crowdsurfing, makes getting around the board a fun puzzle in and of itself. Minions can bounce off the head of any neighboring unit to land on the opposite side, and that’s chainable if a bunch of characters are standing in a line. What would be a traffic jam in most TBS games is a wealth of options in Hex Gambit.

Territory Control




The heart of Hex Gambit is our competitive league play, the Apex Cup. Each season, all of Hex Gambit’s players choose a faction and face off in a community-wide turf war. Points you earn in league matches, win or lose, help your team seize territory on the Summit. Trophies are awarded to all members of the winning faction each season, and to the top performers on each team.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3870 / Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
